skill_constraints: Single point of failure for DirectX/GPU skills (RISK-001, RISK-006). QA capacity is stretched.
resource_bottlenecks: Senior developer in Sprint 4; QA engineer in Sprints 1 & 3.
mitigation_strategies: Aggressive cross-training via pair programming; developers take on more testing responsibility.

skill_constraints: Onboarding overhead for new QA resource.
resource_bottlenecks: Senior developer DirectX expertise remains a bottleneck.
mitigation_strategies: Add a second full-time QA Engineer ($70/hr * 120h = $8400). This allows for more thorough testing and reduces developer context switching.
